scenarios.description: A collection of all scenarios in the game.

background.description: Reference to background data for the scenario.

battle_track_name.description: Music to play for the scenario.

boss_icon.description: Reference to a sprite for the boss icon.

boss_portrait.description: Reference to a sprite for the boss portrait.

boss_spawn_sfx_cue.description: Sound effect for the boss spawning. To use a custom sound effect, a sound effect must be registered globally.

boss_variants.description: Reference to BossVariantData. Doesn't need to be set unless you want a custom set of bosses in a non outer train boss scenario. This shouldn't be set if it is a outer train boss scenario.

descriptions.description: Localization data for the scenario's description

displayed_enemies.description: Displayed characters with their offsets for the battle intro screen when this scenario starts.

run_type.description: Type of run this bucket applies to.

distance.description: Controls where the scenario could possibly be encountered. (Ring number - 1).

enemy_blessings.description: Array of references to sin type relics for enemy blessings.

ftue_card_draws.description: Array of references to cards to give if this is a FTUE (first time user experience) scenario. (Not implemented)

names.description: Localization data for the scenario's name

prefab.description: Reference to the map node prefab. Should be a GameObject of type battle_node_icon.

spawn_pattern.description: Defines the waves of enemies and the flying boss character used.

titan_trial.description: Reference to a sin type relic representing the titan trial for a flying boss.

trials.description: Reference to a list of trials possible for this scenario.
